scripts.test:e2e:nightly:prod:browserstack:deskt: npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --grep desktop-nightly --project=Chromium-Win11 --browserstack.buildName 'TB Send Nightly Tests Chromium Desktop' --browserstack.config 'browserstack-desktop-nightly.yml'
